name: Horsey I
description:
Thank you for choosing our software. In "Horsey I" you will get to experience the wild life of a horse. There are 3 friends to collect and multiple Meats to utilize. WE hope "Horsey I" is a tradition that stays with the whole family young and old.
  • CONTROLS:
  • WASD - Move Horsey
  • Q + R - Rotate Camera
  • X - Menu
  • Shift - Horsey Run
  • SPACE - Horsey Jump (can jump atop any obstacle regardless of height)
  • Page Up + Page Down - Turn camera up or down (useful for pits)
  • Has highly repeating textures and fast movement so be careful if you are sensitive to flickering!
  • MUSIC: The Henry Brosch Orchestra - Wooden Heart
  • "Horsey I" is surely the game for you.
HORSEY MAP:
